DOC.brief_summary: Purpose randomize control trial test efficacy individual psychotherapeutic intervention Managing Cancer Living Meaningfully ( CALM ) German sample patient advanced cancer . The intervention aim reduce depression distress support psychological well-being .
DOC.brief_title: German Evaluation Effectiveness Psychological Intervention Managing Cancer Living Meaningfully ( CALM )
DOC.detailed_description: Principal hypothesis : The manualized psychotherapeutic intervention ( CALM ) result significantly great reduction depression psychological distress compare non-manualized supportive psycho-oncological intervention . Secondary hypothesis : The manualized psychotherapeutic intervention ( CALM ) result significantly improve psychological well-being , quality life sense meaning compare non-manualized supportive psycho-oncological intervention .
